text: @jasonrantz @benshapiro @realDonaldTrump Personally, I'm becoming quite perturbed, with this growing insinuation that if you're diabetes is linked to #Covid19. This is a distraction to turn away from the reality that this deadly disease was the direct result of China and their evil *sses.
